text: The sparks glow bright in Hogwarts tonight
Not a teacher to be seen
A world of spells and potions, and it looks like I'm his slave
The Dark Lord Voldemort controls my world
Couldn't stay near him; Merlin knows I tried
Don't let him in, don't let him see
Be the Malfoy you always have to be
Conceal, don't feel, don't let him in
Well now he knows
Let it go, let it go
Can't hold him back any more
Let it go, let it go
Turn away and let sparks fly
I don't care if he'll find me today
Let my dark mark burn
The light doesn't bother me anyway
It's funny how some distance
Makes no difference at all
And the fears that still control me
Don't go away at all
It's time to see what I can do
To test his strength and break through
No right, no wrong, and I can see,
I'm free!
Let it go, let it go
I am one with the snakes and turns
Let it go, let it go
You'll never see me burn
Here I stand
And here I'll stay
Let his fury rage on
My power flurries through the air into the ground
His soul is spiraling in killing curses all around
And one thought crystallizes like an icy blast
I'm never going back, their ways are in the past
Let it go, let it go
And I'll rise from the ashes like Fawkes
Let it go, let it go
That good Pureblood is gone
Here I stand
You aren't in my way
Let the war rage on
The light never bothered me anyway
